* The Command class encapsulates the execution of a command.
* @param taskList List containing the current tasks.
* @param ui Ui which sends a message to the user after a successful execution or when an error is thrown.
* @param storage Storage which saves the modified tasklist to the hard disk after successful execution of command
public abstract void execute(TaskList taskList, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws DukeException, IOException;
* The DeadlineCommand class encapsulates the execution of a deadline command.
* @param taskList List where a deadline is to be added to it.
* @param ui Ui which sends a message to the user after a successful execution or when an error is thrown.
* @param storage Storage which saves the modified tasklist to the hard disk after successful execution of command.
public void execute(TaskList taskList, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws DukeException, IOException {
throw new DukeException("Description of deadline must be followed by /by then followed by time of deadline.");
* The DeleteCommand class encapsulates the execution of a delete command.

* The ListCommand class encapsulates the execution of a list command.

* The MarkCommand class encapsulates the execution of a mark command.

throw new DukeException("This task is already marked as undone:\n" + unMarkTask.toString());
